item.title: brew and macvim
item.description:
there might be problem when you try to use brew install macvim if you already have conda python installed. It is because the installation of macvim via brew requires framework python.

So in order to install macvim, and upgrade macvim:

  1. Open a new terminal and run export PATH=/System/Library/Frameworks/Python.framework/Versions/2.7/bin:$PATH, but don’t put this line in your .bashrc or .zshrc.

  2. brew install macvim or brew upgrade macvim

  3. close the terminal, so your $PATH will restore to default.

item.title: 设置hostname，避免DHCP修改hostname
item.description:
新的mac电脑可能会发现主机名会经常变，这是因为没有设置hostname.

> scutil --get HostName 
HostName: not set

只需设置hostname即可：

> sudo scutil --set HostName "new_hostname"  
Password:  
> scutil --get HostName              
new_hostname

item.title: disable local backup of timemachine
item.description:
timemachine 默认会在本地生成local backup，这个比较占空间，如何取消local backup:

  • Finder -> goto “/Volumes” will see a backup disk

  • ‘sudo tmutil disablelocal’ will disable local cache of time machine

  • ‘sudo tmutil enablelocal’ will enable it again

item.title: run job with at on Mac
item.description:
Mac 上的 at 是由 atrun 运行的，而后者是由launchd 启动的，问题是在Mac上atrun默认是不启动的。

The atrun utility runs commands queued by at(1). It is invoked periodically by launchd(8) as specified in the com.apple.atrun.plist property list. By default the property list contains the Disabled key set to true, so atrun is never invoked.
